answers.answer: i didnt feel any increase in movement when i had the test done.
That makes me feel so much better! Thank you for responding! With my son I felt a lot but I guess every baby is different:)
I passed out while getting my blood drawn.. Should I call my ob??
My baby didnt react to the test.
Were you nervous or anxious? I would call your doctor just to be safe.
I called and they want me to lay down for a hr bc I keep feeling like I am going to pass out:(I felt fine before hand..
May just be from the drink and the anxiety of baby not moving. Just keep still and drink water and try to eat something. I'm sure you're fine. If it doesn't change though call them back!

If it doesnt change in an hour then call your doc. When I had my.test done they told me if I got real bad hot/cold flashes and/or I felt like or did faint then to let them know asap. It may be nothing but just to be safe if the feeling is still there call your doc

question: I am here having the test done and haven't felt the baby move?? Shouldn't she be going nuts after I drink that drink?? Kind of freaking out!
title: Gest diabetes test
